text: 💉🌍 As a passionate advocate for social justice, I believe that access to vaccines is a fundamental human right. It's crucial that we prioritize equitable distribution of Covid-19 vaccines to ensure global health and equality. Let's come together, regardless of political affiliation, to support science, public health, and the well-being of ALL people. Let's protect the vulnerable, save lives, and build a more resilient world. 🌱🤝
